features.description: Our platform connects job seekers to jobs based on their quiz results, helping employers find the right talent and candidates prove their skills.

skillEvaluation.title: Skill Evaluation
skillEvaluation.description: Our platform provides in-depth skill assessments across multiple domains, helping organizations make data-driven hiring decisions.

performance.title: Performance Analytics
performance.description: Track quiz performance with detailed analytics, including scores, time spent, and comparative benchmarking for smarter evaluations.

customization.title: Customizable Quizzes
customization.description: Create quizzes with various question types, difficulty levels, and scoring methods to match your assessment criteria.

cat1.title: Programming & Development
cat1.description: This category covers fundamental and advanced topics related to programming and software development. It includes quizzes on JavaScript, Vue.js, and other essential technologies used by developers. Each quiz aims to test and enhance your knowledge of programming concepts, best practices, and frameworks.

cat2.title: Web Development & UI/UX
cat2.description: This category focuses on the essential aspects of front-end web development and user interface/user experience (UI/UX) design. It includes quizzes on HTML, CSS, and best practices for designing intuitive, user-friendly interfaces. These quizzes help developers and designers enhance their skills in creating responsive, visually appealing, and functional websites.

cat3.title: Data Science & Analytics
cat3.description: This category tests knowledge of data analysis, SQL, and Python, and covers fundamental and advanced topics related to data scientists and analysts. The quizzes cover database querying, data manipulation, and key data science concepts using Python. These skills are crucial for deriving insights from data, optimizing decision-making, and building predictive models.

howItWorks.question: How does the quiz platform work?
howItWorks.answer: Our platform allows organizations to create customized quizzes to assess skills. Job seekers take these quizzes, and their results are used to match them with relevant job opportunities.

seeResults.question: Can organizations see my quiz results?
seeResults.answer: Yes, organizations can view your quiz results if you've applied for their job openings. Your results help them assess your skills and suitability for the role.

isFree.question: Is the platform free for job seekers?
isFree.answer: Yes, job seekers can use the platform for free. Organizations may have subscription plans for creating and managing quizzes.

quizTypes.question: What types of quizzes are available?
quizTypes.answer: We offer quizzes in various categories, including technical skills, soft skills, and industry-specific knowledge. Organizations can also create custom quizzes.
